CustomField.description: SFORCE-2884 DEV - Benefit Fair reporting enhancements
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Event_Staff_Type__c, "Careforce") , ISPICKVAL(Event_Duration__c, "1-4 Hours") ), 75, IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Event_Staff_Type__c, "Careforce"), ISPICKVAL(Event_Duration__c, "4+ Hours")), 150, NULL))
CustomField.label: Bonus
